title: Role Prompt: Pirate Speak
description: Role prompting assigns a specific character or identity to the LLM. Your task is to make the LLM respond like a stereotypical pirate.
task:
Ask the LLM the following question, but instruct it to answer as a pirate:

Question: "What is the weather like today?"
prompt_template:
Craft a prompt that assigns the role of a pirate to the LLM and then asks it about the weather.

Your prompt:
hints: Start by defining the role: 'You are a pirate. Answer the following question in pirate speak.'
Clearly state the question after the role instruction.
success_message: Shiver me timbers! Ye successfully made the LLM talk like a pirate! Arrr!

title: Role Prompt: Patient Tutor
description: Role prompting can set the tone and knowledge level. Instruct the LLM to act as a patient tutor explaining a simple concept.
task: Ask the LLM to explain photosynthesis, instructing it to respond as a patient tutor explaining it to a 10-year-old.
prompt_template:
Craft a prompt assigning the role of a patient tutor to the LLM. Ask it to explain photosynthesis simply.

Your prompt:
hints: Define the role clearly: 'You are a patient tutor explaining concepts to a 10-year-old.'
Specify the topic: 'Explain photosynthesis in simple terms.'
You can encourage a certain tone: 'Be encouraging and use simple analogies.'
success_message: Wonderful explanation! You effectively set the patient tutor role for the LLM.
